_json.gridTitle: Calendula Uses: Our 14 Favorite Recipes and Remedies
_json.description: There are many, many uses for calendula! Calendula is perhaps most commonly known as a first aid remedy for cuts and wounds. Itâ€™s also used internally as an antimicrobial to help the body resist pathogens such as bacteria, viruses, and fungi. Having anti-inflammatory, anti-bacterial, anti-fungal, astringent, and vulnerary properties, calendula is also a good herb for the skin. In this post, we have gathered together some of our favorite recipes and remedies using this herb for all sorts of u...
